name: SAA-Apprentice-Data-Schema
title: SAA Apprentice Database Schema
description: The schema for SAA (State Apprenticeship Agency) entities to use to format their individual apprentice data for reporting to the Department of Labor's RAPIDS Database. RAPIDS is a national database that tracks apprenticeship programs and apprentices in the United States. The schema includes fields for apprentice demographics, program details, and status information.

fields.name: uniqueID
fields.title: uniqueID
fields.description: The unique identifier assigned to the apprentice. This value must be unique within the dataset.

fields.name: sponsorID
fields.title: sponsorID
fields.description: The identifier assigned to the apprentice's sponsor.

fields.name: dob
fields.title: dob
fields.description: The apprentice's date of birth. Must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: genderInd
fields.title: genderInd
fields.description: '1' if the apprentice indicates that he is male. '2' if the apprentice indicates that she is female. '9' if the apprentice did not self-identify.

fields.name: ethnicInd
fields.title: ethnicInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates being a person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture in origin, regardless of race, the value of this field is '1'. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify ethnicity, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: natIndianInd
fields.title: natIndianInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates origins in any of the original peoples of North America and South America (including Central America), and who maintains cultural identification through tribal affiliation or community recognition, the value of this field is '1'. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify ethnicity, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: asianInd
fields.title: asianInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian Subcontinent (e.g., India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Sikkim, and Bhutan), the value of this field is '1'. This area includes, for example, Cambodia, China, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, record '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify ethnicity, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: africaAmerInd
fields.title: africaAmerInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa, the value of this field is '1'. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify ethnicity, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: natHawaiInd
fields.title: natHawaiInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands, the value of this field is '1'. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify ethnicity, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: wInd
fields.title: wInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa, the value of this field is '1'. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify ethnicity, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: vetStatInd
fields.title: vetStatInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates having served on active duty in the armed forces and who was discharged or released from such service under conditions other than dishonorable, the value of this field is '1'. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is '2' or '0'. If the apprentice does not self-identify veteran status, the value of this field is '9'.

fields.name: disabilityInd
fields.title: disabilityInd
fields.description: If the apprentice indicates having any “disability,” as defined in Section 3(2)(a) of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12102). Under that definition, a “disability” is a physical or mental impairment that substantially limits one or more of the person’s major life activities. (For definitions and examples of “physical or mental impairment” and “major life activities,” see paragraphs (1) and (2) of the definition of the term “disability” in 29 CFR 37.4, the definition section of the WIA non-discrimination regulations.), the value of this field is ‘1’. If the apprentice does not meet any of these conditions, the value of this field is ‘0’. If the apprentice does not self-identify disability status, the value of this field is ‘9’ or '0'. Note: the undocumented value of '5' is also found in the SAA datasets.

fields.name: education
fields.title: education
fields.description:
The highest level of education the apprentice has completed. The value of this field is the highest grade the apprentice has completed or the highest degree the apprentice has received. Permitted values are:
1. Not High School Graduate
3. High School Graduate (including equivalency)
5. Participant did not self-identify
6. Some College or an Associate's Degree
7. Bachelor's Degree
8. Master's Degree
9. Doctorate or Professional Degree

fields.name: termLength
fields.title: termLength
fields.description: The total number of hours the apprentice is expected to work during the term of the apprenticeship program.

fields.name: termLengthRemaining
fields.title: termLengthRemaining
fields.description: The total number of hours the apprentice has remaining to work during the term of the apprenticeship program.

fields.name: startDt
fields.title: startDt
fields.description: The date the apprentice began the apprenticeship program. Must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: expCompDt
fields.title: expCompDt
fields.description: The date the apprentice is expected to complete the apprenticeship program. Must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: exitDt
fields.title: exitDt
fields.description: The date the apprentice exited the apprenticeship program. Must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: status
fields.title: status
fields.description:
The current status of the apprentice in the apprenticeship program. Permitted values are:
CO: Completed
CA: Cancelled
RE: Registered (assumed active)

fields.name: statusReason
fields.title: statusReason
fields.example: Apprentice received a job offer and left the program.
fields.description: Additional information about the apprentice's status, typically when the status is 'CA'.

fields.name: entryWage
fields.title: entryWage
fields.description: The hourly wage the apprentice received when entering the apprenticeship program. This number must be a float/decimal value representing dollars and cents even when the value of cents is zero (e.g., 15.00).

fields.name: exitWage
fields.title: exitWage
fields.description: The hourly wage the apprentice received when exiting the apprenticeship program. This number must be a float/decimal value representing dollars and cents even when the value of cents is zero (e.g., 15.00).

fields.name: onetSocCode
fields.title: onetSocCode
fields.description: The O*NET-SOC code associated with the apprentice's occupation. The code must be in the format ##-####.##.

fields.name: occTitle
fields.title: occTitle
fields.description: The O*NET title of the apprentice's occupation. This must match the title of the recorded O*NET-SOC code.

fields.name: occType
fields.title: occType
fields.description:
The type of apprenticeship in which the apprentice is enrolled. Permitted values are:
TB: Time-Based
CB: Competency-Based
HY: Hybrid
